title: Apple Personalized Internet Assessor
summary: Join Apple's quality assessment team as a Personalized Internet Assessor. You will evaluate and improve the quality of internet content and search results to enhance user experience across Apple's ecosystem. Strong analytical skills and attention to detail required.

title: Google Personalized Internet Ads Assessor
summary: Evaluate and improve the quality of personalized internet advertisements for Google's advertising platform. You will assess ad relevance, quality, and user experience to enhance Google's advertising ecosystem.

title: Apple Media Search Analyst
summary: Analyze and improve media search functionality across Apple's services including Apple Music, iTunes, and Apple TV+. You will evaluate search results quality and help enhance user discovery experience.

title: Google Bluebell - FI Participant Sourcing Request
summary: Support Google's Bluebell research initiative by coordinating participant sourcing and recruitment for financial intelligence studies. You will manage research logistics and ensure quality data collection.

title: Apple Global Quality Rating Program
summary: Lead quality rating initiatives across Apple's global markets. You will establish and maintain quality standards for Apple's services and products across different regions and cultures.

title: Google Global Ads Domain Quality Rating Program
summary: Manage global quality rating programs for Google Ads domains. You will assess ad quality across different markets and ensure compliance with global advertising standards and policies.

title: Apple Geo Data Evaluator
summary: Evaluate and improve geographic data quality for Apple Maps. You will assess location accuracy, validate map data, and enhance the overall mapping experience for Apple users worldwide.

title: Google Internet Safety Evaluator
summary: Ensure internet safety across Google's platforms by evaluating content, assessing risks, and enforcing safety policies. You will help protect users and maintain a safe online environment.

title: Apple Media Search Analyst - Advanced
summary: Lead advanced analytics for Apple's media search capabilities. You will develop sophisticated algorithms and models to enhance search functionality across Apple's media services.

title: Google Apple Online Data Analyst
summary: Analyze data flows and integration between Google and Apple platforms. You will support strategic partnerships and ensure seamless data exchange between the two ecosystems.

title: Apple Online Rater e-Commerce Analyst
summary: Rate and analyze Apple's online e-commerce experience. You will evaluate the Apple Store online, assess user journeys, and provide insights to improve the digital retail experience.

title: Google US Rater - English (US)
summary: Rate and evaluate Google Search results for the US English market. You will assess search quality, relevance, and cultural appropriateness to improve Google's search experience for US users.
